Definition: Given an English language product review, you must determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone. A bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: It feels great, the only thing I'm not happy about is that you have to take the iPad out of it's holder when you're using a dock because sometimes there's interference. But other than that, a great product. Would buy again. :)

Just got it out of the box and put to use first try. Very happy with results. I had been searching for a good tool for this job but could not find one. This is easy to use, quick and clean. Great product at an unbelievable price. Thanks Porter Cable. As always, great prices Amazon. Always satisfied service from Amazon too. Keep on Truckin. David F / Dallas, TX

Do not buy this product. It literally falls apart like a piece of junk. I bought it in December 2009 and it's only been used maybe 5 times. Just yesterday the sound no longer worked when trying to turn on or change channels. This is horrible for anything besides show sound. Also some people who posted reviews said you couldn't use an ipod. You can't. Apple did screw up making that feature completely useless by adding this adapter instead of supporting it. When buying it, look at the price tag.

This bag is pretty nice - I use it as a carry-on for air travel, and it's really convenient. It's light weight, but very sturdy. The only downside to this one (compared with the other styles I've had) was that all of my items inside were getting bent in odd ways, so I had to bend down just right or rearrange them. It took me awhile to get used to, but... now, nothing gets bent. After traveling through two different countries recently, I'm still happy with it.

The sound is terrible and the connection breaks way too frequently. Mine lasted a year, until I plugged it in one day to find my PC speaker having died. :( I'm very disappointed with this. If you are looking for cheap, these speakers may work OK but if you're an Apple fan who wants something that's long lasting, definitely look elsewhere. Don't waste your money like me. My other complaint though would have been that this product requires 4 AA batteries while it's rated at 2 amps.
This water bottle stays nice looking when its been cleaned even with milk spills.

Good set of headphones, great for the priceComfortable when worn properlyGreat sound for their price (I know you have paid more than that with other brands)All functions work wellThe extra volume button and play/pause buttons are good. I like it a lot!

The first one delivered was broken. I decided to send it back and get a replacement, thinking maybe the customer representative had done something wrong and sent the broken unit again. Instead, I got yet another broken one, and no longer have any faith in Amazon for these things. It's nice they are refunding my money since the product isn't worth it. Do not buy this if you want one. It has been a frustrating experience, and it's really quite sad that such an otherwise wonderful brand sells this.
